definitions.definition: Any of a class of organic compounds consisting of various numbers of amino acids in which the amine of one is reacted with the carboxylic acid of the next to form an amide bond.
performance - enhancing drugs , often a synthetic peptide compound

main_definition: ( organic chemistry ) Any of a class of organic compounds consisting of various numbers of amino acids in which the amine of one is reacted with the carboxylic acid of the next to form an amide bond.
secondary_definitions: ( euphemistic , usually construed as plural ) performance - enhancing drugs , often a synthetic peptide compound
